text:
Mozilla Research | Intern | Bay Area, Paris & Toronto

We are looking for PhD or MS level interns to take on various projects within our Research Group: Rust, WebAssembly, Daala, Servo and more.

Past interns have done substantial work in Language Design, Compiler Optimizations, Garbage Collection, Static/Dynamic Analysis, Record-and-Replay Debugging, Parallel Algorithms, Video Codecs, and Web Application Optimization.

Apply at:

https://careers.mozilla.org/en-US/position/oj092fwe
